column2:
"Oh, wow...
This is worse than I could
have imagined. Picking up
hostile readings everywhere."

"And not just ESC-A Darkers...
The vast amount of Ether left on
the Moon has come together and
formed an embodiment of Mother."

"Ether embodying its own creator...
It sounds like a sick joke, but it's all
too real. We're looking at a kind of
perpetual motion machine here."

"Without a physical body to hold back
its desires, it's driven solely by its
instinct to corrupt and destroy."

"...Naturally, as ARKS, we
can't let this stand. It'll be a
tough fight, but do your best!"
